name: RSI Ursa Rover
description:
Manufacturer: RSI
Focus: Exploration
Built by RSI specifically for the planetside explorer, the Ursa Rover offers civilians military-grade all-terrain capabilities and stands as the rugged standard in ground-based scouting, mapping and discovery applications.
description_cn:
制造商：RSI
定位：探索
RSI专为行星表面探索打造的大熊座漫游者为平民提供了军用级全地形能力，并且还是路基侦查，制图和探索发现应用领域中的耐用品质标杆。
